titleStmt.title: Demonologia sacra, or, A treatise of Satan's temptations in three parts / by Richard Gilpin.
titleStmt.author: Gilpin, Richard, 1625-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Richard Randal and Peter Maplasden ...,

notesStmt.note: A work of religious experience, the first title being somewhat misleading. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
